opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: O'COnnOr v. Northshore International Insurance Services, Inc.

opinion:
536 U.S. 919

O'CONNOR
v.
NORTHSHORE INTERNATIONAL INSURANCE SERVICES, INC., ET AL.

No. 01-1205.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 17, 2002.

1

C. A. 1st Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Swierkiewicz v. Sorema N. A., 534 U. S. 506 (2002). Reported below: 21 Fed. Appx. 15.
